publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3251 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Designation of Lead Committeeâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the Local Government Committee be designated as Lead Committee in consideration of the Public Appointments and Public Bodies etc. (Scotland) Bill at Stage 1 and that the Health and Community Care Committee, the Education, Culture and Sport Committee and the Justice 1 and 2 Committees be secondary committees. Supported by: Euan Robson*
